vistra.framework.algorithm

Interface IAlgorithmManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlgorithmManager

    public interface IAlgorithmManager
    An algorithm manager interface.

    An algorithm manager holds two lists:

    • a list with all algorithms available
    • a list with selectable algorithms supporting an edge type (as a selection out of the algorithms available)
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)

      • updateSupported

        void updateSupported(EdgeType edgeType)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates the list of supported algorithms. Afterwards, the list holds all and only the algorithms capable to traverse edges as given by type.
        Parameters:
        edgeType - the edge type
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • execute

        ITraversal execute(ILayoutGraph graph)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Traverses a graph as given by executing the algorithm. Returns a traversal as immutable list of ISteps generated during the execution of the algorithm.
        Parameters:
        g - the graph to traverse
        Returns:
        the traversal
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
